text.text_translated: Dreams about receiving a phone call from an old friend or the death of someone close are usually just a coincidence. Coincidence means that two things happen at the same time by chance. It does not mean that one causes the other. Prophecy, which means telling about future events before they happen, is less likely to explain these dreams. Of course, we often forget the many times we dream about these things but they do not actually happen.

best_attempt.text_translated: Dreams about receiving a phone call from an old friend or about the death of someone close are usually just a coincidence. A coincidence is when two things happen at the same time by chance and not because one causes the other. Prophecy, which means predicting future events, is less likely to explain these dreams. Of course, we often forget the many times we dream about these things but they do not actually happen.
